title: Atomic Number Sixty
description: Thriller/Suspense story told across one hour of real time (60 chapters, 60 minutes). A girl is locked in a room with a bomb counting down to zero. The intensity levels are rising. What would you do, if you only had one hour left to live? [Atomic Number Sixty is the first part of a thrilling series, with 60 chapters each set in real time taking the reader 1 minute to read. Book 2 - "Massacre of the Sixty" - is now available in ebook and paperback]
author: Dave    Johnston
